data.name: Louny Balloony
data.detailed_description:
Louny Balloony is a high-flying side-scrolling platforming adventure! Take control of a young balloonist-in-training as you leap, bound, and flutter your way across a variety of environments navigating against various obstacles and enemies that stand in your way! Collect balloons and feathers you find on your journey to bolster your flying abilities in order to overcome increasingly challenging, yet also increasingly enchanting, levels!

***FEATURES***

  • Vibrant, unique levels -- Multiple levels, each containing a unique environment, music, and obstacles!
  • Forgiving gameplay -- A non-traditional hitpoint system allows you keep playing no matter how often you're hit. As long as you can stay in the air, you can't lose!
  • Hidden treasures -- Secret collectables can be found by exploring! Find special balloons to access challenge stages in order to find even more exclusive treasures!
  • Surprises abound -- Beware a variety of different threats hidden throughout the skies including powerful boss enemies that challenge your reflexes and puzzle-solving capabilities!

  • Forgiving gameplay -- A non-traditional hitpoint system allows you keep playing no matter how often you're hit. As long as you can stay in the air, you can't lose!

data.short_description: Fly through the exciting skies in this unique side-scrolling platformer! Collect balloons and feathers to gain the ability of flight as you navigate dazzling landscapes and face off against surprising obstacles and enemies during your aerial journey across the world!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4570 CPU @ 3.20GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

Recommended:
